sentences.sContent: In other comparable countries, real wages increased much more rapidly.
sentences.sCn: 在其他可比的国家里实际工资增长快得多。

sentences.sContent: By contrast, the comparable figure for Canada is 16 percent.
sentences.sCn: 对比之下，加拿大的可比数字是16%。

phrases.pCn: 可比较的，比得上的；与…相容；可同…比较

words.tran: 比较；对照；比喻；比较关系

trans.tranCn: 可比较的， 比得上的 <
trans.tranOther: If two or more things are comparable, they are of the same kind or are in the same situation, and so they can reasonably be compared
